chronoMod:ArcaneBarrage.NAME: Arcane Barrage
chronoMod:ArcaneBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL When you draw this card, increase its number of hits by 1 this combat and gain 1 chronomod:Jade.

chronoMod:ArcaneBolt.NAME: Arcane Bolt
chronoMod:ArcaneBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have chronomod:Jade, gain 1 chronomod:Jade to deal double damage.

chronoMod:AstralBeam.NAME: Astral Beam
chronoMod:AstralBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and draw !M! card. NL Gain 1 chronomod:Jade.
chronoMod:AstralBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and draw !M! cards. NL Gain 1 chronomod:Jade.

chronoMod:BlackHole.NAME: Black Hole
chronoMod:BlackHole.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! X damage. NL Gain X chronomod:Jade. NL Exhaust.

chronoMod:DejaVu.NAME: Deja Vu
chronoMod:DejaVu.DESCRIPTION: Play the last card that you played.

chronoMod:DistortReality.NAME: Distort Reality
chronoMod:DistortReality.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your discard pile onto the top of your draw pile.

chronoMod:EventHorizon.NAME: Event Horizion
chronoMod:EventHorizon.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, gain !M! [E].
chronoMod:EventHorizon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, gain !B! Block and !M! [E].

chronoMod:Flux.NAME: Flux
chronoMod:Flux.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Gain 1 chronomod:Jade.

chronoMod:ManaBall.NAME: Mana Ball
chronoMod:ManaBall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When you draw this card, increase its damage by !M! this combat.

chronoMod:ManaBarrier.NAME: Mana Barrier
chronoMod:ManaBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When you draw this card, increase its Block by !M! this combat.

chronoMod:Memento.NAME: Memento
chronoMod:Memento.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, you can choose to place !M! card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile.

chronoMod:MysticBarrier.NAME: Mystic Barrier
chronoMod:MysticBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! additional Block for each chronomod:Jade that you have.

chronoMod:MysticBlast.NAME: Mystic Blast
chronoMod:MysticBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! X damage. NL Gain 1 chronomod:Jade.

chronoMod:MysticShot.NAME: Mystic Shot
chronoMod:MysticShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! additional damage for each chronomod:Jade you have.

chronoMod:StarSurge.NAME: Star Surge
chronoMod:StarSurge.DESCRIPTION: chronomod:Recall: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

chronoMod:TemperedFate.NAME: Tempered Fate
chronoMod:TemperedFate.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would lose HP. Gain 1 chronomod:Jade when this effect triggers.

chronoMod:TidesOfTime.NAME: Tides of Time
chronoMod:TidesOfTime.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you trigger a chronomod:Recall effect, apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

chronoMod:TwilightAssault.NAME: Twilight Assault
chronoMod:TwilightAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E] and 1 chronomod:Jade.

chronoMod:WheelOfTime.NAME: Wheel of Time
chronoMod:WheelOfTime.DESCRIPTION: Your next Attack deals !M! X additional damage.

chronoMod:Wormhole.NAME: Wormhole
chronoMod:Wormhole.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, gain 1 Intangible and !M! chronomod:Jade. NL Ethereal.
